FizzBuzz in one line of JavaScript

function fizzBuzz(n) { return (n % 3) === 0 ? (n % 5) === 0 ? "FizzBuzz" : "Fizz" : n % 5 === 0 ? "Buzz" : "" }

Sweet JavaScript.

11 Oct 2012
